name: Simon MacDonald
bio: Simon has over twenty years of development experience and has worked on a variety of projects, including object-oriented databases, police communication systems, speech recognition and unified messaging. His current focus is contributing to the open source projects Architect and Enhance to enable developers to create functional web applications. Simonâ€™s been building web applications since the days they were written using shell scripts, and he still has nightmares about those dark days.
